featureExtract module¶

This module Extracts features (player, enemy, bombs) from the main game loop and stores the data as a two-demensional list

Project : Bomberman Bot with Machine Learning Olin College Software Design Final Orject, Spring 2017 By : TEAM AFK

class featureExtract.grid(game)[source]¶

Bases: object

Tile Code: 0 = VALID SPACE, 1 = WALL, 2 = BRICK, 3 = SECRET BRICK, 4 = SECRET BRICK 7 = ENIMIES, 8 = PLAYERS, 9 = BOMBS

add_bombs(target_matrix)[source]¶

Adds bombs(represented as 9) to the target_matrix

add_enemies(target_matrix)[source]¶

Adds enimies(represented as 7) to the target_matrix

add_players(target_matrix)[source]¶

Adds players(represented as 8) to the target_matrix

matrix¶

A 2-d list(matrix) of players, enemies, and bombs on the grid
